name: Triangle! - 2D Platformer Game
description:
Triangle! is also available on Google Play! Link here: Triangle!

Triangle! is a tricky 2D platformer game where the goal is to complete the stages by going through different levels while each death throws you back to the previous level.

Triangle! Features:
- Addictive platformer game based on dynamic physics.
- Over 30 levels.
- Extremely challenging gameplay.
- Simple but outstanding 2D graphic design.
- Dozens of complex traps carefully designed to stop you.
- Rhythmical game sounds.
- Unexpected new tricky levels on every stage.
- Adorable character with awesome animations.
